name: show_todo
description:
show todo list based on a argument of todo list. outputs like 1. hoge
 2. fuga...

name: add_todo
description: add user input to argument todo list. in the function, take input() to get user todo, then append to the argument todo list.

name: remove_todo
description: remove todo list based on a argument of todo list. in the function, take input() to ask user which todo to remove by index number, then remove the todo from the argument todo list.
